Welcome

I'm Mathai NT

B-class supervisor

Mathai NT

B-class supervisor

Im a B-class Electrical Supervisor since 2016. Well experienced in electrical field. We are providing Coaching for Electrical Wireman Examination through online and offline. I have permit of Electrical Installation upto 50 kW including Generators upto 50 kVA. I have more than 5 years of teaching experience in Wireman Examination. I can register upto 10 Apprentice every year. Our group is actively contributing in many electrical fields like Supervising, Teaching, Generator Installing and Contracting.

  • From: Thrissur, Kerala
  • Lives In: Wadakkanchery
  • grade: B-class
  • Experience: Above 5 years
